original_text: The Lord Almighty says, ‘I will make Babylon a place where wild animals live. There will be pools of bad water. I will sweep everything away, like someone who sweeps dirt away with a brush.’ A message about Assyria The Lord Almighty says, ‘I will make Babylon a place where wild animals live. There will be pools of bad water. I will sweep everything away, like someone who sweeps dirt away with a brush.’ A message about Assyria The Lord Almighty says, ‘I will make Babylon a place where wild animals live. There will be pools of bad water. I will sweep everything away, like someone who sweeps dirt away with a brush.’ A message about Assyria The Lord Almighty says, ‘I will make Babylon a place where wild animals live. There will be pools of bad water. I will sweep everything away, like someone who sweeps dirt away with a brush.’
korean_text: 내가 또 그것이 고슴도치의 굴혈과 물 웅덩이가 되게 하고 또 멸망의 빗자루로 청소하리라 나 만군의 여호와의 말이니라 하시니라

sentences.original_text: I will make Babylon a place
There will be pools of bad water.
like someone who sweeps dirt away with a brush.
sentences.korean_translation: 마치 사람이 솔로 먼지를 쓸어버리는 것 같이
